content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my two children and my cousins son to a fair that came to town.I was driving on everest pkwy towards del prado blvd., i believe that we were heading west on everest pkwy. my cousin tim was in the passenger seat, my two son's and my cousins son were in the back seat. as i was driving i looked up and saw bright lights and said "what the hell is that" and stopped the car. besides the lights it was how low it was and slowing down to a stop over a field were a fire department once was, next to water plant that got my attention.I asked everybody in the car again "what the hell is that", everyone was getting excited.The object was still, i can see about 10 to 12 lights under it, with the light of the moon the body of it looked like a shinny silver color beyond the lights. the object started to move in the direction that we came, i turned the car around and the object moved faster as some of the lights went off. my cousin was saying what i was seeing " some of the lights went off and it is flying sideways " i could not keep up with the object it was going fast and flying sideways up high till it was out of view.Everyone in the car was excited and all seen the same thing.

if someone contacts me i would be glad to give a sketch of what the object looked like. i am happy that someone else seen what i have seen, i have seen other things in the past but never reported it because i did not want people to think i was crazy. but i have 4 others know that have seen.
content.summary: Triangle shape,with about 10 to 12 lights under it, body looked shinney silver.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?

i was a passanger in my car driving home from work.

2. what made you first notice the object?

my attention was just drawn in that direction.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

i was unsure what it was.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions.

in the sky above the mountain there was a red round ball of light that was moving side to side, i witnessed this for several seconds before it shot out of sight before my wife could even look over.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

i was mystified by what it was as it moved faster than anything i have ever seen.
content.summary: Red round light

content.detailedDescription:
This morning about 5am to 6am i awoke to see this
black figure that was next to my bed it was about
5 foot 5 inches tall. all you could see was a
see threw haft invisable black thing as i awoken
this morning. and i saw this thing for about
5 seconds. before i fell back to sleep for a minite
or more and then the et was gone. it was a little
scary but not too much. the figure was human shaped.
with no real fetures, like a face. but had legs, arms,
hands, body, neck and head. it did infact tuch me but
i am not shure where. or what it was here for, i mainly
just saw this thing.
content.summary: Et encounter

content.detailedDescription:
Vanatage point: car window at ground level. car was parked and not in motion.

witnesses location: corner of himes and columbus.

viewed two fireballs with long tails flying in a horizontal formation one on top of the other moving in a westerly direction south of our position. after about 15 to 20 seconds of flight in a constant direction with the top fireball varying in distance only slightly from the bottom fireball (by separating in distance vertically), the fireballs made a manuever that seemingly defied the laws of physics. they both executed a 120 to 140 degree turn towards the earth and seemed to spiral around each other in an arc before they were no longer in our view.

at first i thought i was seeing a blimp, which are common around raymond james stadium (which was north of our position) until the two balls of fire separated and distance from each other and made the turn downward.

from my estimates, depending on how large the objects were, they were between 1 and 5 miles south of our position. unfortunately it is diffcult to discern their distance when there is no reference for how large the object or objects are.

we could no longer track the objects as they lowered in decent as they became obscured by trees and buildings. the objects were not seen by us again.
content.summary: 2 fireballs following simular western paths then taking sharp turn downwards towards the earth

content.detailedDescription: We left together from fiance"s house in stephenville near heb around green veiw additions. i went the wrong way and turned left on 377. then went over the bridge and turned left on harbin rd. went over the railroad tracks.Drove past swan st.And noticed it to the left of us about 500 feet up(i would say it was sitting right over heb maybe.)it was hovering in place.It was amber in color with the color moving throughout it.We didn't stop.I couldn't drive down the road straight because we where looking at it.I called my brother and told him what we saw and where it was so he could see it.
content.summary: Was driving down the road and saw it. it was some what close.

content.detailedDescription:
I went hiking at the phoenix mountain preserves this holiday morning. the day was warm, clear and cloudless. there were no airplanes or jets flying this early in the morning. i didn't notice anything until i uploaded the photo.

main photo, original, not modified.
curved swept-wing object
a flying humanoid?
content.summary: Swept wing craft and flying person?

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i returned from a movie about 10pm in the evening, took our large dog out to our back yard, as we always had done, prior to retiring for the evening.  behind our home was several acres of cornfield.  we both noticed a golf ball shaped light...First thought it was a star or planet as it wasn't twinkling, as a star appears to do.  whlile we were both looking at it, since it was motionless, but very bright, all of a sudden it starting making extremely fast zig zag movements, stop, make zig zag movements again.  we simultaneously looked at each other and at the same time said "did you see that!".  as we continued to watch these eratic movements, a beam of light shot out from this object, about 20' from where we were standing on our lawn and we both ran to the back porch door to get in the house, since it frightened us.  beam of light covered about 10' in a concentrated area.  as we were running to the house, i looked back and it shot straight up and out of sight at incredible speed sending off what appeared to be a mixture of a short but slightly red, orange and blue trail.   no sounds were made at any time of this sighting.
content.summary: White golf ball shaped bright object in unbelievably fast zig zag motion sends down beam of light.

content.detailedDescription:
While at local shopping area i dropped my brother off at a local store.
while there i saw a man walk out of a store and point up to the sky.
i noticed a diamond shape moving slowly in from the columbian river.  this object stopped moving over an area near mill plain bld and freeway 205.  
object stayed hovered or tethered in the same spot for approximatly 15 min.
my brother and i left the store and drove to get underneith this object and got about a block away were we stopped to get gas.
this object was in sight up to walking in to pay for the gas.
20 seconds later while walking back to truck to track this object i noticed it was gone.


i first thought this was a tethered blimp or balloon.
thinking this was a simple thing to find out i started looking for a tether of some sort
content.summary: Diamond shape moved in slowly over vancouver and hovered for 15 min or so

content.detailedDescription:
Date and time are estimated.  it could have been any time between early 1974 through summer of 1976.  though, i believe it was a summer evening in 1975 after dark, which would make it after 9:00 pm edt.  i am estimating the time based the fact that some of the neighbors who were there moved to a different neighborhood in 1976, and i don't think i had started first grade yet, which i did in september 1975.  i put it in summer, because i don't think i would have been out riding bikes in the dark during school, but it could have been spring and maybe earlier in the evening, but it was definitely after dinner.  it could have been 1974, and i have seen similar reports from that year, but for some reason i think it was later.

i was out riding bikes with my brother and some neighbors in newnan, georgia.  in the summer of 1975, i was 5 years old and my brother was 8. there were 5 or 6 of us all gathered at the end of the driveway of the kid across the street from my house.  we were in a subdivision off roscoe road, and during the event we were facing due north. most of the land in that direction for about a quarter mile was undeveloped forest, but there were houses on the gravel back road and pasture beyond some of the woods.  right next to my house was a clearing that at one time was going to be a short road, and the neighbor���s driveway was directly across the street from it.

what caught our eye was a huge, glowing, orangey-yellowy circle or sphere that flew in from the west and hovered near the center of that clearing, not too far over the tree line.  we all stood and watched it hover for a moment, then it split in half vertically and fire shot up out of the middle. i don���t remember an actual fireball being released, just an explosion of fire.  then the two halves came back together and the sphere flew back off to the west and below the horizon.   i seem to remember it went up a little before it went west and down.  all the movements ��� appearing, disappearing, splitting, and rejoining ��� were calm, smooth and controlled, like gliding. from what i remember, it didn���t make any sound. i don't recall it illuminating anything. it seemed to be close, maybe a quarter to a half mile away, but there is no way really tell how far away it was or how large. the width of the clearing was standard two-lane road length, about 20 feet, and the object appeared to take up about the same amount of space in width from our perspective. it may have been a little narrower or wider than the clearing, but not much.  the entire event was brief, probably under a minute.

i haven't seen those neighbors in a long time, but my brother and i still talk about it from time to time.  my sister had gone in for a minute and missed it, but she remembers us telling her about it. i have never seen any mention of it anywhere by anyone else and don't recall anything at the time.  i come to sites like this occasionally to search for a description of anything similar around the same time. not knowing where the object really was means, of course, that anyone for many, many miles could have seen it.  i���ve found a few similar stories from around ga around that time, but the only one that mentions fire at all reported a fireball from a rectangle.

a couple of years ago, i met some folks in athens, ga who knew two guys that i knew in high school in newnan.  they told me that in the mid-to-late 1980s, two of them were in one of their backyards lying on a trampoline and saw some type of event which they described as a ufo that totally freaked them out.  i don't recall all the details of their experience, but i do know it was different from mine.  i think they saw a line or other formation of several lights.  at any rate, i got very excited when the people started to tell me about it, because i thought it may have been around the same time as my sighting.  after i found out it was a good 10-13 years later and different, i still remained quite excited about it, because that particular guy lived about 2 miles north of my house in the macedonia road area.
content.summary: A glowing orange circle/sphere hovered, split in half, exploded into fire, came back together and flew back into the horizon

content.detailedDescription: I went to bed around 8:oo p.M. and was awakened by something touching my right hand.I raised my head up to see what awakened me and i saw a small creature standing at my right foot area,it was short and gray in color.                                                 i then realized i was not in my bed at all,i was on a sort of table, the creature didn't say anything to me but i could feel it wanted to show me something. it stepped to it's left,my right,and i noticed that the wall behind it had symbles on it.                                                          two of the symbles were illuminated in a foggy green glow,they were about shin height to the creature.One of the symbles was shaped like a pyramid and had depth to it'with kind of an orb center. the other symble was shaped like the creatures hand with three fingers on top a palm and a fourth finger in the center of the lowest part of the palm.                 it was also illuminated green with dark lines where the palm and fingers bent at the joints.After i looked at the symbles the creature stepped forward and touched my right hand with it's middle finger and i went back to sleep.Iawoke later and my right hand hurt 'i had a rash between my right index finger and middle finger for several weeks. also the area over the center/middle of my eyes is still more pronounced.Where the third eye is supposed to be located.Imade drawings of what i saw ,but not of the crewature ,i still have them.
content.summary: There was no exterior view by me .

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north down a road that had multiple stoplights. when i was stopped i saw what appeared to be a bright white twinkling star. i continued to watch it because it appeared much brighter and lower than a typical star. i rubbed my eyes to make sure i was seeing clearly.The object twinkled. i watched it for over five minutes to see if it moved. at least 5 minutes passed and it remained stationary. then it began to move south slowly and silently. was it was overhead i saw it was shaped like a boomerang/stealth with a blue light on the tip  of one wing and a red light  on the tip of another. once it began to move i  was surprised since i had watched it for over 5 minutes and it hadn't moved. i thought it was the stealth but someone told me the stealth can't hover. i lost sight of the object as it was moving south and i began to drive east.
content.summary: Object that looked like bright star was stationary for over 5 minutes than began to move

content.detailedDescription: On many occasions,and mostly when i am taking my son to early athletics practice, we have observed a large, white, circular object in the east/southeast sky.  at first, i attempted to disclaim it as a planet,star, plane or aircraft of some kind. due to its minor movement, its not always being their and its location in the sky changes, i have come to realize it is an unidentified whatever.  i have witnessed ufos, as a child, but have not again until the last year.  i also have resently observed a larger, orange, circular object in the western, northwestern sky, early to late evening while driving home up hwy 67. although, i am now seeing alot of people coming forward with sightings in the area, i believe these sightings have been going on for around a year.  the sightings i have witness could have been dismissed as something else yet i know differently.  i have recently, and for the first time considered viewing them thru the telescope.
content.summary: Many mornings a circular shape apears in the east/south east sky

content.detailedDescription: It was a beautiful, sunny, saturday afternoon at 4:30pm on 4/24/04.  i was lying on my bed looking up at the sky through my window, when i noticed two pink triangular shaped objects way up in the clouds.  i often see jets flying in the sky where these two pink triangles were, but these were obviously not jets.  i stood up, went to the window, and observed the two pink triangles for a few minutes, trying to figure out what they could be.  i quickly dismissed them as kites, balloons, or planes, as they were stationary and did not move, nor were they helicopters.  after a few minutes, they moved in unison...First to the left...Then up a bit.  they hovered and then disappeared in the sky.  i immediately phoned my husband who was unavailable, and then my cousin and a friend to tell them of the event.  a few minutes later, the two pink triangles reappeared in a different part of the sky, but not too far away from my original sighting.  again, they were stationary, then moved in unison, then eventually disappeared into the clouds.  it was an amazing experience, and unfortunately, i was not able to photograph them as my camera was broken.
content.summary: Two pink triangles hovered in sky, moved in unison, then went into clouds

content.detailedDescription:
For the labor day weekend the family was gathering on the folks ranch located about 5 mile ese from valley mills, and about 20 miles wnw from waco. it being warmer in the ranch house than in the yard, the adults were sitting in the yard visiting and waiting on my brother and his family to arrive. the group consisted of my mother, step-father, sister and her husband and my wife and myself. suddenly, someone noticed this large object hovering, slowly rotating above us at an altitude of about 1000 ft. it was shaped like a toy spinning-top, had lighted ports about its perimeter and appeared to be some 200-to-300 feet in diameter. as we were marveling and commenting, an airplane began approaching from a southerly direction and made a turn toward the object. quickly, the object departed easterly at a very high speed and disappeared over the horizon in less than 10 seconds. when my brother arrived, he laughed heartily at our description. as an aeronautical engineer for general dynamics in ft. worth, he did not believe in flying saucers. about ten days later, i received from him a copy of the gd internal newspaper. it turned out that the airplane we had seen was a gd plane flying from san antonio to ft. worth, and the description from the pilots matched exactly our own observations. i am a mechanical engineering graduate from texas a&m and a retired cororate officer. i can see the events of that night of more than 50 years ago almost as clearly as i did then. there is no doubt in my mind that we saw a very real ufo in the form of a "flying saucer." 

none of the persons who winessed this occurrence with me are still alive, unless it be the pilots or a pilot of the gd airplane. while i have described this even to numerous people over the years, i did not know until recently about your organization.
content.summary: Ufo hovered overhead for about ten minutes, then disappeared at an extremely high speed.

content.detailedDescription:
These pictures were taken friday and friday night. #1 picture was taken with a canon from inside my home. i noticed 2 strnage objects north of my home. one object looks like a triangle. 

it so happens that pic 2 also shows a very large triangle just above the tree. this pic was taken with a sony camera the night of pic 1. i noticed some strange lights just above the tree and reached for the camera. i had no clue that the object was so large. the trees are large pine tree. this object had to be huge.
content.summary: Very large triangle day and night picture

content.detailedDescription: We left together from fiance's house over in the green veiw additions.I went the wrog way i should have goneand turned left on 377and turned left on harbon rd went over rail road tracksdrove buy swan stand noticed it to the left of us about
content.summary: Was driving down the road and saw it.It was some what close.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from a meeting at my school and as i turned on a darker highway a spotted 3 very vivid stationary lights in the east sky.  at this time they formed a triangle.  i looked closer because they were brighter than any star i'd seen and they formed such a perfect design together.   as i continued driving north into greeley the 3 lights then lined up on top of each other with just a little space in between.  i stopped my vehicle and took a picture with my cell phone.  there were 2 other vehicles i believe saw them as well because they were pulled over in a driveway looking.  i've always been afraid of ufos but this did not scare me or make me uncomfortable in any way.  i continued home looking at them in my rear view mirror.  at last look they had separated and formed the original triangular shape i first saw them in.  when i looked back one last time before entering city lights they were gone.

the shape of the individual light was difficult to see when they were lined up together.  when they separated i could see a somewhat diamond shape looking as if there were more than one light on each edge of it.
content.summary: 3 ufo's over lasalle/evans/highway 85 area, co

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting my mother in oklahoma city the weekend of january 5. it was about 11:30 p.M. and it was hot in her home and so i cracked open a window above the bed i was sleeping in. i was alone in the bedroom. 

i had dozed off when as clear as day i heard someone tell me "hello." but the voice did not come from outside, it came from within my head. it's so hard to describe. i know it wasn't a dream. at first, i thought someone had broken into the house and was in my room. so, i laid very still waiting to hear some kind of noise  - nothing. then i remembered i had cracked open the window and thought that the person was outside the window. without looking out the window, i reached up and closed the window. 

the voice didn't return but as i laid there trying to hear anymore sounds that might indicate there was an intruder around the house, i noticed the neighborhood dogs were barking in a crazy way that i've never heard before. it almost sounded like a panic. after a few minutes, i fell asleep and woke up in another hour when my daughter returned from a date. 

i live in dallas and with the news of the sightings in stephenville, i was curious if anyone had come forward with any reports of being contacted. 

i know reporting this is a lot riskier than reporting a sighting but it's very unnerving when something like this happens - especially when you feel like you've been mentally violated or penetrated, for lack of a better description.

at any rate, it has not happened again to my recollection.
content.summary: No sighting

content.detailedDescription:
Driving north on carlisle pike somewhere in silver springs twsp. about 5-6 pm.  dark. plenty of rush hour traffic. in north- west sky first noticed a series of red lights in a vertical line appear one by one then dissapear. thought it was automobile red brake lights reflecting off window glass. daughter saw it first as a passenger while i drove. "daddy, did you see that?" rolled down drivers side window to see more clearly as lights reappeared again in a top to bottom verticaly spaced line, then dissappear one by one top to bottom then reappear slightly further north again as a single light. lights did not seem to be part of one single object.Distance from us to lights about less than a mile. repeated about 7 times during 15 to 20 minute period.This top to bottom vertical pattern was unlike any airplane witnessed at night by us in 7 years of residence.The impression we had was that the lights came from nowhere and then vanished. no horizontal motion line like an airplane. lights moved from the northwest to the northeast. at no time did it appear to be an object, just lights.

this general direction is often used by approaching aircraft to hbg. itl. airport but these lights did not appear like any previous airplane or helicopter lights at night. approaching airplanes come from the nw to the se for airport. at one point we pulled into a school parking lot to get a clear and stationary view.Turned off engine. could not hear the sound of a plane or helicopter engine. not knowing the objects size can not say how far away it was by this time.It appeared to be moving somewhere to the north of us along susquehanna river.Upon arriving at home the lights either stopped or were out of our view.How did we feel? "spooked and a feeling of being watched".My daughter wished she had not witnessed this event.
content.summary: Successive red lights appearing then fading in vertical pattern/line.

content.detailedDescription:
Description and date of incident: 

 

on thursday, december 27, 2007 around 5:30 pm i was out shooting photos of the sunset near my home.  there was a line of clouds which obscured the sunset and this wasn���t a spectacular sunset as i had expected. the clouds were very thick and high. air traffic from charlotte international airport (clt) was passing directly over head and you could see the aircraft above and through the cloud deck. i was trying a variety of shutter speeds to try to get some decent images. when i got home and down loaded the photos to my computer (from a nikon d80).  i glanced through them quickly and was about to delete the entire set of images because i was not really happy with them.

 

then in image 0056, i noticed a dark shape below an opening in the cloud deck. the opening was white and contrasted the entire image. when i loaded the photo in photoshop and did some standard adjustments for level, color and contrast, a dark triangular shape appeared clearly. enlarging the image and enhancing it come more showed a definite black triangle. i looked at the image before (0055) and after (0057) and the shape does not appear in either photo. the time between image 0055 and 0056 where the shape appeared was 24 seconds. the time between image 0056 (image of triangle) and 0057(object does not appear) was 17 seconds. all the shooting data for each image is shown in the image i put together.  i did not notice anything unusual or out of the ordinary while taking the photos. there was no air traffic from ctl at the time the images were taken.

 

when i enlarged and enhanced the triangle in image 0056 and applied sharpening in photoshop, you start to see some edge structure of the triangle. this is not visible in the image which i put together. but there appears to be a sharp edge line on the leading edge of the triangle. it almost looks like when it passed under the cloud opening, the bottom is in shadow (black) and the front edges show a faint straight edge. also you will note a light spot appearing in center of the shape.  if you compare the before and after images (055 and 057), there is no trace of the object, nor is there any unusual change in the cloud pattern. the texture does not match the bottom of the cloud deck in any manner as far as color or hue.

 

if anyone has any idea of what it was i photographed i would like to hear from them. i have been doing photography for a long time and am familiar with aircraft. this does not fit into what i have observed over the years. it might be a cloud effect, but i don���t think so. any thoughts to what it might be? i decided to keep all the images for the fun of it now.


location:  fort mill, sc

note: this is a screen shot of the original pdf image. original images were shot at fine resolution and imported into adobe illustrator from photoshop. original size of document is 23 mb. the bit map image is not of the same quality, but shows the object in question. anyone interested in the original images should contact  me.
content.summary: Triangular “object” photographed near fort mill, sc

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were traveling from houston to tulsa.  it was a clear night with no moonlight.  as we crossed the state border i noticed a bright light approaching from the rear.  there was no noise.  being a pilot myself, i assumed that it was an aircraft that had lost power and was going to use my headlights to land in the road ahead of me.  then the light got brighter than anything i had ever seen.  the countryside was lit up like a gigantic football field.  i just kept driving.  it hovered over us for a minute or two.  then it left at a speed that would not be possible for any aircraft.  about five minutes later we saw a bright light moving across the horizon.  again, the speed was way beyond what could be achieved by any known aircraft.
content.summary: A bright white light hovered over my car for about a minute

content.detailedDescription: Me and my boy was coming back from a basketall game and i was driving on hwy 2005 between hamilton and goldthwaite when i noticed a shape like a tower with red lights, at first i did not think anything about it, but it just went away and i thought the lights had gone out on the tower. i even pulled over to take a look. the object looked like it was still like a tower not moving, but i really did not look at it very hard until i noticed it was just gone. i have been by there several times since, both daytime and night, no tower in that area ? i also read where a person seen the same thing in mccullogh couty as well.  i would have not posted this but i have been seeing the ufo sightings in stephenville and wondered if this was the same thing.
content.summary: Seen what looked like a tower at first near hamilton

content.detailedDescription:
Wednesday, nov 21, i was in the parking lot of mesquite college with a friend. time was 5:20 to 5:35 pm. the sun was just over the horizon. i observed what was first thought to be a strange exhaust pattern of a jet. however, there was no sound and it was moving slow. i told my friend to look where i was pointing.

this flying/floating barge was an elongated triangle shape, color was dark gray and huge! perhaps 250 - 300 feet long and the butt end was about 150' - 200' wide. no running lights except for a single strobe which was emitted once from the snout (that i witnessed). it was southwest of my position about 2 - 3 miles 
(i guess over the river area) at an elevation of 2,400' to 3,000' moving south then turned southwest. a small plane with running lights crossed over it going west to east (i wonder what they were thinking?). 

the damn thing went out of range and it got too dark to see it. had to get into class anyways.

after class when i returned home, i looked on the net to find what i could about it.
the following site was the closest to it, also describing "large slow crafts" (back in ww2 the term referred to ships. . .  of a different type!).

this was totally cool, as i'd love to have one of these "sky yachts"!!!
http://www.Space.Com/businesstechnology/flying_triangle_040902.Html


the last time i saw a flying triangle thing it was only about 4' long and 2' wide and flew right over our heads, along the phone lines on a busy street next to csun in la about mid 1980's. me and an engineering student watched it for a few blocks. . .


i need a new mufon investigator card (my last one from 1978 is trashed, as was my nicap card)
content.summary: Sky yacht sighted abt 100 miles se of area 51

content.detailedDescription:
It was a clear summer night in 1967 and i was comming home from work in my car near kent wahington
first i saw flashes of lite and herd thunder on the hill top to the east  and then i saw a serch light in the night sky coming down, then the saucer appeared ,the light went out when the vehicle stoped moving, it first appeared transparent and then changed to metal, first dark red (mov) then mixed to solid silver and was the size of a car.
it hovered 35 feet away from me 35 feet up in the air, no sound, no smoke,a single small white light began to move, travleing around the primeter edge of the disk.
 the craft began to move after 4 to 5 minutes, travleing south slowely picking up speed, i clocked it at 85 mph and after 1/4 mile the saucer turned west at a right angle and i followed it with my car, after one block the saucer turned north at a right angle again and it did not bank on the turns, i followed it for one block, stoped my car,and i turned off my engin.
i got out and watched it disapear, it made no noise, however i felt it knew i was following it.
i was a trained observer,u.S.Army lrrp,i never used drugs,i was not drinking.
it is my openion;  "the saucer was not from this world and verry high technology".
i reported the sighting to all the authorties, who did not believe me,
including most of my friends and family and my boss.
i have stood by my report for 40 years. i will swear to it to my grave. 
i was a structual test mechanic for the boeing aircraft co. at that time.
i was qualifyed to work as a structual test mechanic on the sst and the 747 and a hydrolics specialest. my eye sight was 20/20 and my hearing was 
normal. i have never ben contacted by anyone about my report.
content.summary: 35 feet away, 35 feet off the gruond, size of a car, no noise, one light on edge of disk circleng,

content.detailedDescription:
While on a cigarette break, i looked at the moon and the layout of the stars in the sky.  i do this often as that i try to remember things from astronomy class.

a co-worker called to me and said goodnight.  we chatted for a moment, and he went on his way.

i turned back to where i was looking and noticed that something was different about the stars.  however, for a few seconds i couldn't see the difference for it was minute.

once those few seconds passed, i could see what was different.  it was a circle that appeared the size of one of the smaller stars in my field of vision, and it was moving in a northeast direction by a few degrees.

my first thought was, "oh my, a u.F.O., or, a spy-plane."  however i "recovered" and decided to observe for as long as possible.  this "dot in the sky" was so small that i didn't feel my celphone cam would pic it up on the partly cloudy night.

it appeared to continue its northeast trajectory, then that trajectory gradually changed.  after about twenty seconds, its trajectory changed about fifteen degrees to the east until i lost it in the clouds.

it was as luminous as the stars/planets.

i have decided to report this because the next day someone else told me they also observed it.
content.summary: While looking at the moon and stars, i saw a circle move against the sky.

content.detailedDescription: Around october 1, 2004, i was walking at the dublin high school track.  i was looking up at the sky when i noticed a series of round, reddish-orange lights that were too big to be from an airplane.  it started out as one light, then two, then three, then four, then five.  when all five lights were on, the fifth went out, then the fourth, the third, and so on.  the lights were in a horizontal row, and this pattern repeated itself several times over the course of 2-5 minutes before disappearing.  i could not see the actual object because it was dark and the lights were very bright.  i continued to look for the object that night and many nights afterward, but i never saw it again.  i have never seen anything like this object before or since.  i could not tell exactly how far away it was, but i could tell that it was extremely large and moving very quickly.  the object seemed to be quite far away, but was certainly flying lower than an airplane would be.  i knew immediately that this was something unusual.  my father is a pilot, and i have seen many different types of aircraft, and nothing i've seen remotely matches the description of this object.  i never reported this incident, but after the recent sightings in erath county, i wanted to share my experience.
content.summary: Row of 5 lights going off and on

content.detailedDescription:
At around 8:45 pm i received a call, telling me that there was a strange amber light hovering over stephenville. after driving around for ten minutes or so, my wife spotted the object towards the north east side of town. as i stopped the car and stepped out of the vehichle, i witnessed the amber light flicker as if on a metalic surface. it was several miles away, and around 1,500ft to 3,000ft? (or maybe higher) in the sky. i have no way of describing just how large the light was, but i am guessing sizeable. it moved in the same general direction, but not necessarily in a straight line. there were no flashing aircraft lights, only the amber flicker. it moved slowly, before stopping in mid air. suddenly it gained several thousand feet in altitude (almost straight up) in a matter of seconds, before turning bright (almost stoplight red) as if on fire, and then vanishing. 

i was unable to take photos, or video. 

the exact duration of time wasn't very long. but i know it was no plane.
content.summary: Flickering amber light. hovering, turns red, vanishes.

content.detailedDescription: Noticed white light with a beam of light coming from the bottom of object.Later it had moved across the sky and appeared closer.I always look up at the sky every night.A very bright light more so than a normal star.A ufo.My feeling on this is that the object was not nice.It became light outside
content.summary: Green white red lights over grand junction co

content.detailedDescription:
Hello
 i am a resident of stephenville, tx. i was getting back from buying fireworks in stephenville, tx on december 31, 2007. it was around 6:00. i was in the car with my dad and my friend, they both saw the thing in the sky also. there was a very bright light in the sky traveling very very fast, about 2-3 times bigger than a star, a second light popped up, very close to the first one, for about 30 seconds, then dissappeared, but the first light was still there. tuesday the 8th of january wasn't the only day we saw the ufo.
content.summary: Ufo sightings in stephenville on new years 2007

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting around,the power was out and i was hoping to catch sight of a ufo,when i got hungry, got a snack and when i came back, there were red spheres floating in the sky, and i watched them, as i had seen a bigger one ever since the power had been out,and they were there for about 3 hours, and it looked like they were sparring, as they would fly right at each other,then i put my snack mess away, as quickly as possible, but when i returned,they were gone.I felt like i was going to cry,i had always wished to see a ufo,now i have seen them.I made sure it was no plane,as the lights did not blink,it would hover, and it was too fast, it was night, so it wasnt a bird with a reflection, it wasnt a reflection, i looked out the window to make sure it wasnt,and it was obviously a close encounter type 1.
content.summary: A red ball was flying in the sky, and just kept flying around, around, and again around until it got so late, i had to stop
